description: Creates or updates the lifecycle policy for the specified repository. For more information, see Lifecycle policy template.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository to receive the policy.

parameters.name: lifecyclePolicyText
parameters.description: The JSON repository policy text to apply to the repository.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name associated with the request.
